    • Uses of Expression in com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy.expressions

      Subclasses of Expression in com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy.expressions 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Apply
      Apply extends Expression to implement the XACML Apply Expression element.
      class  AttributeDesignator
      AttributeDesignator extends com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy.expression.AttributeRetrievalBase to represent the XACML AttributeDesignator element.
      class  AttributeRetrievalBase
      AttributeRetrievalBase extends PolicyComponent and implements Evaluatable to serve as an abstract base class for the com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy.AttributeSelector and com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy.AttributeDesignator classes.
      class  AttributeSelector
      AttributeSelector extends AttributeRetrievalBase to implement the XACML AttributeSelector element.
      class  AttributeValueExpression
      AttributeValueExpression extends Expression to represent XACML AttributeValue elements in an Expression context.
      class  Function
      Function extends Expression to implement the XACML Function element.
      class  VariableReference
      VariableReference extends Expression to implement the XACML VariableReference element.
